NAZARA.NS.summary: Nazara Technologies Limited operates as a diversified gaming and sports media platform in India, with presence in the Middle East, Africa, North America, and Asia. The company operates through Telco subscription, Early Learning, Freemium, E-sports, and Real Money Gaming segments. It offers interactive gaming, eSports, sports media, gamming subscription services, and gamified early learning ecosystems. The company engages in providing subscription/download of games/other contents through a consumer base. It owns the IP, including WCC and CarromClash in mobile games; Kiddopia in gamified early learning; Nodwin and Sportskeeda in eSports and eSports media; and Halaplay and Qunami in skill-based, fantasy and trivia games. Nazara Technologies Limited was formerly known as Nazara Technologies Private Limited. The company was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Mumbai, India with additional offices in Dubai and Singapore.
